definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: we start reflecting on that as a way to collaborate.
sentences.chinese: 我们找到了一种共同点。

sentences.english: VOICE: What do logarithms, biology and logic have in common?
sentences.chinese: 对数，生物学和逻辑学有甚么共同点呢？

sentences.english: Messrs. Buffett and Sokol have some things in common.
sentences.chinese: 巴菲特和索科尔存在一些共同点。

sentences.english: You may have to ask several people in order to determine the common denominators.
sentences.chinese: 你可能需要去询问好几个人来确定他们所说的共同点。

sentences.english: Do they have anything in common?
What do dust , cat hair and pollen have in common ?
sentences.chinese: 灰尘，猫毛和花粉有什么共同点？

sentences.english: Share a characteristic about yourself thatyou have in common with the audience.
sentences.chinese: 分享你和听众的共同点，创造和谐和共识。

sentences.english: The similarities of the factors between different grades which affect the study motivation.
sentences.chinese: 各年级学生在影响其学习动机因素方面的共同点。

sentences.english: This text intends to analyze the common ground of these leaders on human rights.
sentences.chinese: 本文拟对三代领导核心人权思想的共同点进行分析。

sentences.english: For instance, find the common ground between your needs and their wants.
sentences.chinese: 举例来说，找到您的需求和他们的愿望的共同点。

sentences.english: There have been many proposals, but all share two features.
sentences.chinese: 提案已然数不胜数，但总归有两个共同点。

sentences.english: These markets have much in common, but each is also remarkably different.
sentences.chinese: 这些市场有很多共同点，但每个市场也都显著不同。

sentences.english: What's Islam and a sat-nav got in common?
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰教和车载卫星导航系统有什么共同点？

sentences.english: What's the biggest thing they share in common? They are both fantastic Hong Kong-style action flicks.
sentences.chinese: 它们之间最大的共同点也许就是港式的武打片风格。

sentences.english: What do these two have in common? They both have problems with anger.
sentences.chinese: 两位的共同点是什么呢？在“愤怒”上都出了问题。

sentences.english: We have the same barber, but not much else in common.
sentences.chinese: 我们有相同的理发师，但再无其他共同点。
